thread.title: Russia may end cooperation with European Court of Human Rights - RIA

title: Russia may end cooperation with European Court of Human Rights - RIA

organizations.name: european court of human rights - ria reuters

text: March 1, 2018 / 8:28   Russia may end cooperation with European Court of Human Rights - RIA Reuters Staff 1 Min Read MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russia is considering withdrawing from the European Convention on Human Rights and ending cooperation with the European Court of Human Rights, the RIA news agency reported on Thursday, citing unnamed government sources. The reason for considering withdrawing from the court was because of the fact that many of its decisions ran counter to Russiaâ€™s interests, the sources were cited as saying. Reporting by Katya Golubkova; Writing by Maria Tsvetkova; Editing by Andrew Osborn
